ComicInfo.Title: Shiny Black Taxi Cab; Losing My Edge
ComicInfo.Summary:
David Kohl. Kid-with-Knife. An Army Surplus Land Rover. An impossible mission to save a friend. It's like 2006 again. Nothing's change. Except everything has, as THE IMMATERIAL GIRL reveals as it builds towards its climax...
*Notes:* The cover is a homage based off of the music video Money for Nothing by Dire Straits.
ComicInfo.Characters: Kid-With-Knife,Emily Aster,Indie Dave,Seth Bingo,Lady Vox,David Kohl
ComicInfo.Locations: New York State,New York City,Brighton,Behind the Screen,England,London,Manhattan,Minehead,Times Square
